title: Thread for getting party rewards
body:
Basically Riot's got party rewards on trail period right now which means that if you queue up with friends you get more IP, you also get more IP for having more friends in each game. 
So basically like some of you, I don't have 4 friends all online at any given time so the purpose of this thread is to add me as a friend and to add each other as friends so that hopefully everyone will have at least 4 friends online at any give time.

replies.body: also looking for a norms group
